speaker: kevin
text: A few things need to evolve. First, you need to break down the wall between product and data science. In many organizations, the data science team is a separate function that product can "request" work from. In an AI-native org, data science capabilities need to be embedded in product squads. Every squad that's building AI-powered features needs direct access to someone who understands model evaluation, prompt engineering, and data pipeline management.

text: Three things. First, start using AI tools aggressively in your own work today. Don't wait for your company to roll out an AI strategy.
